plot: "Bob's Ark" is a very short, multi-media bible spoof combining live action, crayon animation and stock footage that tells an old story with a new perspective.
title: Bob's Ark
plot_es: "Bob's Ark" is a very short, multi-media bible spoof combining live action, crayon animation and stock footage that tells an old story with a new perspective.
plot_en: "Bob's Ark" is a very short, multi-media bible spoof combining live action, crayon animation and stock footage that tells an old story with a new perspective.
